com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface ImplicitDepsInferringDescription

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenruleDescription, JavaThriftLibraryDescription

    public interface ImplicitDepsInferringDescription
    While building up the target graph, we infer the implicit dependencies of a rule by parsing all parameters with types SourcePath or BuildRule. However, in some cases like GenruleDescription, the GenruleDescription.Arg.cmd argument contains build targets in a specific format. Any Description that implements this interface can modify its implicit deps by poking at the raw build rule params.
